meanings.sent1: I always keep a box of kleenex in my bag for when I have a runny nose.
meanings.sent2: She reached for a kleenex to wipe away her tears.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a never-ending string of kleenex out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a comforting kleenex for his emotional wounds.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the kleenex against her skin was a gentle touch of comfort.

meanings.definition: A disposable paper tissue used for wiping the nose or mouth.
meanings.sent1: After sneezing, he quickly grabbed a kleenex to blow his nose.
meanings.sent2: She always carries a pack of kleenex in her purse for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The clown's trick involved pulling a never-ending chain of kleenex from his sleeve.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was contagious, spreading like a box of kleenex in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The kleenex was a lifesaver when she spilled her drink and needed to clean it up quickly.
